attributes.action: Give his thanks, in Parliament, to the Daily Telegraph for informing the general public of the extent of the MP's expenses scandal..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Daily Telegraph, in publishing details of MP's greed and immorality has caused over 100 MPs to announce that they are to stand down at the next election as well as greater transparency in many forms of public life. This is arguably the most significant political reform of Parliament over the last 25 years. The Telegraph's lead should be formally marked with thanks from the Prime Minister.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
